item.title: And again
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
And again

heat and cold light and dark life and death

but I still cannot find it is it all a lie?

and again

06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: I wonder will I reach it
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
I wonder will I reach it but perhaps, after all may I believe my lie?

I'll call that place my home the years be kind and warm

So I'll learn, to grow myself the garden, to overcome the winter

I'll explore, salty oceans and emerald mountains, rivers of golden and infinite hills

And I promise, to keep my word and to have courage to redeem my errors

I come from where its dark and empty it's destiny's fault, says I

What else should I do on this tired boat on what has been and what it is, but to look forward in time

09-10-2025

This poem was translated from Italian to English

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: Immense Power
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
A simple tool with immense power

to do good to make you happy to hurt you it must be used properly

yet why do I struggle to rearrange the alphabet

06-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: On top of an iceberg
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
Balancing on top of an iceberg

the ice is melting the fall is cold

can will defeat the inevitable?

09-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index

item.title: Stay away
item.author: Giovanni Santini
item.description:
I keep them distant and shout stay away!

as I am unfit and unworthy as I resign myself from their beauty

so I remain silent not to harm them to keep them safe

15-09-2025

Travel: Poetry, Index
